title.rendered: “IDF Eliminates Hezbollah Terrorist, Strikes Military Infrastructures in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

An aircraft attacked and eliminated a terrorist from the Hezbollah terror organization in southern Lebanon; military buildings and terror infrastructures of the Hezbollah terror organization were attacked by fighter planes.

A short time ago, an Air Force aircraft attacked and eliminated a terrorist from the Hezbollah terror organization who was near a military building belonging to the organization in the area of Mis Al-Jabal in southern Lebanon.

Additionally, in recent hours, fighter jets attacked terror infrastructures and military buildings of the Hezbollah terror organization in the areas of Al-Khariba, Hlata, and Yaroun in southern Lebanon.

A short time ago, several launches were identified from Lebanese territory towards the Arab village of Aarab Al-Aramsheh and Admit in Western Galilee. The details are currently being checked.
